tail.name: abdomen
tail.transformationDescription:
A chitinous, oval-shaped spider's abdomen sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long and over half that in width. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(realise)] that the transformation isn't done, as after a tingling sensation has run up from the tip of [npc.her] new abdomen, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] a deep channel taking form within it. Instinctively, [npc.she] [npc.verb(know)] that this channel is [npc.her] new spinneret, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] it immediately starting to produce silk.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldSpider(spider-like abdomen)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)].
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] spider abdomen, complete with a spinneret.
